operator.op: tms.xtmst_unloadorder uld.xtmst_unloadorder_id='%{xtmst_unloadorder_vLst[xtmst_unloadorder_id]}' UPDATE tms.xtmst_unloadorder uld JOIN tms.xtmst_unloadorderdetail uldd ON uld.unLoadOrderID=uldd.unLoadOrderID JOIN tms.xtmst_dispatchplan dp ON uld.VehicleRealTimeID=dp.VehicleRealTimeID AND dp.FreightID=uldd.FreightID JOIN tms.xtmst_freight f ON f.FreightID=dp.FreightID left JOIN tms.xtmst_pickuporder pk ON f.PickupOrderID=pk.PickupOrderID JOIN tms.xtmst_vehiclesituation vs ON vs.VehicleRealTimeID=uld.VehicleRealTimeID AND vs.CityID=uld.unLoadCityID AND vs.Address=uld.unLoadAddress SET uld.Status=603,dp.Status=303,f.STATUS=if(f.ConsignmentMode=1001,if(f.DeliveryMethod=1211,if(f.ToXSiteID=dp.ToXSiteID,208,210),if(f.DeliveryMethod=1212,if(f.ConsigneeAddress=dp.ToAddress,214,if(f.ToXSiteID=dp.ToXSiteID,209,210)),214)),if(f.ConsignmentMode=1002,205,214)),pk.orderSTATUS=IF(f.FreightType=1200,104,107) WHERE %{WHERE}; set @vrtid=null;select VehicleRealTimeID into @vrtid from %{table} uld where %{where}; UPDATE tms.xtmst_vehiclerealtime vrt JOIN tms.xtmst_freight f ON vrt.VehicleRealTimeID=f.VehicleRealTimeID AND f.status in (206,207) SET vrt.Status=404 WHERE vrt.VehicleRealTimeID=@vrtid and (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM tms.xtmst_freight WHERE VehicleRealTimeID=@vrtid AND STATUS not in (206,207))=0; ,vrt.Status=404

DbDetails.DbTable: tms.xtmst_unloadorder uld left JOIN tms.xtmst_unloadorderdetail uldd ON uld.unLoadOrderID=uldd.unLoadOrderID
